Instruction:
Task Description: Create a Go struct that implements a RocketMQ push consumer with configurable options, message handling, and tracing capabilities.

Struct Description: The PushConsumer struct encapsulates a RocketMQ push consumer with additional features like rate limiting, tracing, and message processing. It manages consumer lifecycle and message subscription.

Fields:

name: string - Name identifier for the consumer  
PushConsumer: rocketmq.PushConsumer - Embedded RocketMQ push consumer instance  
PushConsumerConfig: PushConsumerConfig - Configuration for the consumer  
subscribers: map[string]func(context.Context, ...*primitive.MessageExt) (consumer.ConsumeResult, error) - Map of topic to message handler functions  
interceptors: []primitive.Interceptor - List of interceptors for message processing  
bucket: *ratelimit.Bucket - Rate limiter bucket for controlling consumption rate  
started: bool - Flag indicating if consumer is running  

Methods:

RegisterSingleMessage: (f func(context.Context, *primitive.MessageExt) error) -> *PushConsumer - Registers a single message handler function with tracing and panic recovery  
Start: () -> error - Initializes and starts the RocketMQ consumer with configured options
